String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: Is that all, you big baby? You are the very definition of a milk-drinker.
String.Dest: 这就是全部了吗，你这个长不大的家伙？难怪人们都说你是乳臭未干。

String.Source: I'm not a milk-drinker. If you went through what I went through, you'd be clutching both of your mother's teats.
String.Dest: 我是老江湖。我走过的桥比你走过的路还多。

String.Source: If such a child dies, it just proves it was too weak for this world.
String.Dest: 如果这小孩死了，这只能说明他对这个世界来说太弱小了。

String.Source: Maybe so, but it wasn't dead yet, or so I had hoped.
String.Dest: 也许是这样，但它还没死透，或者我希望是这样。

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: No matter how much I shrunk into my covers, I couldn't avoid that foul hiss. But I dared not look.
String.Dest: 不管我怎么努力的缩进我的被子里，都不能回避那邪恶的嘶嘶声。但我不敢看。

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: Then came the sound of footsteps walking to my door. I was about to go into shock when I heard my mother's voice.
String.Dest: 我的门口处传来了阵阵脚步声。当我听到我妈妈那声音的时候我几乎就要休克了。

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: I leapt out of bed and ran to door, flinging it open. And there she was.
String.Dest: I leapt out of bed and ran to door, flinging it open. And there she was.

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: My mother, holding a candle. And standing over her shoulder...was a wraith.
String.Dest: 我的母亲，手持着一支蜡烛。而那个站在她肩膀之上的东西...是个幽灵。

String.Source: Erik is all mine. You can't have him.
String.Dest: Erik是我的.你不能拥有他.

String.Source: Then, you're married? Mralki never told me. Maybe Mralki's looking to remarry. I won't have to leave then. Ever.
String.Dest: 那么，你们结婚了吗？穆拉基可从未跟我说过这事情。或许人家一直想要复婚。我不会就此罢手的。永远不会。

String.Source: Stop the courier, you had your own room? Are you some noble's daughter?
String.Dest: 停下来，信使。你有自己的房间吗？难不成你是哪个贵族的女儿吗？

String.Source: My mother was a servant, and had yet to finish her duties to our lord. The boy who broke my heart was the nobleman's son.
String.Dest: 我的母亲是个仆人，但还是没有完成她对我们主人的职责。那个伤了我的心的男孩儿是个贵族的儿子。

String.Source: Why are you so afraid of leaving?
String.Dest: 为什么你这么害怕离开呢？

String.Source: I'm cursed. It's been with me since I was a young child. It's the only explanation for what happened at Helgen.
String.Dest: 我被诅咒了。自从我还是个年幼的孩子时那诅咒已经伴我而生。这也是发生在海尔根的事情的唯一解释。

String.Source: Starving to death is a rather painful way to die. Better to be quick about it.
String.Dest: 饿死太痛苦。最好能快点。

String.Source: Nobody chooses to starve to death, and neither will I. Not until the choice is between that and leaving this inn.
String.Dest: 没人会选择饿到死，我也不会。除非选项只有饿死和离开这旅店。

String.Source: Wraiths don't stand. They float.
String.Dest: 幽灵不站着。它们漂浮。

String.Source: I suppose it was floating. I never bothered to look at its feet. I just closed my eyes and prayed.
String.Dest: I suppose it was floating. I never bothered to look at its feet. I just closed my eyes and prayed.

String.Source: Wraiths don't stand. They float.
String.Dest: 幽灵不站着。它们漂浮。

String.Source: I asked Arkay not to take our souls, and to fill my body with life.
String.Dest: 我向阿凯祈祷，不要带走我们的魂灵，愿它与肉体同在。

String.Source: Wraiths don't stand. They float.
String.Dest: 幽灵不站着。它们漂浮。

String.Source: I asked Mara for her to bless my mother, and to strengthen the bond between us.
String.Dest: 我向玛拉女神祈祷。请求她护佑妈妈健康长寿，为我们的爱情祝福。

String.Source: You stumbled upon an Oblivion Gate. Obviously.
String.Dest: 很明显，你偶然发现了一扇湮灭之门。

String.Source: Is that what it was? I'm not sure, but I wouldn't put it past me. I am cursed, after all.
String.Dest: 那东西还和以前一样么？我不确定。但我不会让它经过我身边。毕竟我被诅咒了。

String.Source: I do it all the time. Nobody seems to mind.
String.Dest: 我一直都是这样做的，但是似乎没有人意识到这点。

String.Source: Well, they could just be very polite, or blind or something. Okay, so maybe it is just me getting spooked.
String.Dest: Well, they could just be very polite, or blind or something. Okay, so maybe it is just me getting spooked.

String.Source: I do it all the time. Nobody seems to mind.
String.Dest: 我一直都是这样做的，但是似乎没有人意识到这点。

String.Source: The Stormcloaks used to say the same. But I have good reason to be.
String.Dest: 风暴斗篷总是用同样的说辞。但是我有一个不错的理由。

String.Source: The boy made a wise choice. Even now, you are obviously unfit to wed.
String.Dest: 这个男孩做出了明智的决定。尽管如此，你作为一个结婚的对象也是不合格的。

String.Source: I'm fit enough to take you outside and squash your skull into cabbage soup, if you don't shut your mouth.
String.Dest: 你丫再不闭嘴我就把你拎出去抽你的脑浆榨鲁花花生油！

String.Source: The boy made a wise choice. Even now, you are obviously unfit to wed.
String.Dest: 这个男孩做出了明智的决定。尽管如此，你作为一个结婚的对象也是不合格的。

String.Source: I mean...not outside. Not literally. You know what I mean. I could do it right here, as soon as Mralki's back is turned.
String.Dest: 我的意思是……不是表面。不是字面意思。你明白我想说什么的。我能做对，只要穆拉基能转过身来。

String.Source: The boy made a wise choice. Even now, you are obviously unfit to wed.
String.Dest: 这个男孩做出了明智的决定。尽管如此，你作为一个结婚的对象也是不合格的。

String.Source: By the Divines, you're right. I am unfit. It's the curse. Ever since that night when my heart was broken, I knew it was real.
String.Dest: 圣灵在上，你是对的。我干不来。这是个诅咒。自从那晚我的心碎成一片一片的之后，我就知道这是真的。

String.Source: So you're a Stormcloak.
String.Dest: 所以，你是风暴斗篷。

String.Source: Was a Stormcloak. Now I'm just an ordinary shut-in. Never going to leave this inn, as long as Mralki is willing to have me.
String.Dest: 我曾经是个风暴斗篷。而现在我只是个普通人啦。只要穆拉基还愿意留住我，我就永远不会离开这家酒馆儿。

String.Source: So you're a Stormcloak.
String.Dest: 所以，你是风暴斗篷。

String.Source: Maybe I can marry his son, and then they'll let me stay here forever.
String.Dest: 也许我能嫁给他儿子，然后他们就会允许我永远呆在这里。

String.Source: No, I saw the snow jumping off the dirt. As if the knocking wasn't coming from behind me, but beneath.
String.Dest: 不，我看见雪从泥土上跃起。仿佛那震动并非从我身后传来，而是从我脚下。

String.Source: Higher and higher, until it was right under my feet.
String.Dest: 越走越高，直到它被我踩在脚下。

String.Source: And that's when the clouds shifted and the moonlight lit the marker in front of me.
String.Dest: 阴云移动之时，月光照亮了我面前的标记。

String.Source: It wasn't a rock marker. It was a grave marker.
String.Dest: 这不是一块儿石头标识。这是一座墓碑。

String.Source: I take it you fled.
String.Dest: 这么说你逃走了。

String.Source: I did what any sane Nord would've done.
String.Dest: 我干了任何精神正常的诺德人都不会干的事.

String.Source: I take it you fled.
String.Dest: 这么说你逃走了。

String.Source: When I got back to the camp, the Quartermaster demanded to know where I'd been, and what happened to the supplies.
String.Dest: When I got back to the camp, the Quartermaster demanded to know where I'd been, and what happened to the supplies.

String.Source: I take it you fled.
String.Dest: 这么说你逃走了。

String.Source: In truth, no explanation would suffice. It's just as well, because even I can't explain what was under my feet that night.
String.Dest: 实际上，不必解释了。这样就好，因为即使是我也无法说明那晚我脚跟底下是什么。

String.Source: Saw what?
String.Dest: 看到什么了？

String.Source: The snow jumping off the dirt. As if the knocking wasn't coming from behind me, but beneath. Higher and higher, until it was right under my feet.
String.Dest: 泥土上的雪被抛至半空。似乎那巨响并不是从我身后传来，而是从地下。它越来越高，直到我觉得它就在我脚下。

String.Source: Saw what?
String.Dest: 看到什么了？

String.Source: And that's when the clouds shifted and the moonlight lit the marker in front of me.
String.Dest: 阴云移动之时，月光照亮了我面前的标记。

String.Source: Saw what?
String.Dest: 看到什么了？

String.Source: It wasn't a rock marker. It was a grave marker.
String.Dest: 这不是一块儿石头标识。这是一座墓碑。

String.Source: So they vanished. Or something vanished them. What then?
String.Dest: 就是说他们全部消失了，或者被什么东西给消灭了，然后呢？

String.Source: I found myself standing in plot of fallow dirt, empty save a rock marker.
String.Dest: 我发现我站在一块淡棕色的土地上，除了有一块石头记号以外那里空无一物。

String.Source: So they vanished. Or something vanished them. What then?
String.Dest: 就是说他们全部消失了，或者被什么东西给消灭了，然后呢？

String.Source: I called out again to the woman, but there came no answer. I called out once more, and then came a reply.
String.Dest: 我又叫了这女人一次，但却没什么反应。我又叫了一次，然后有了个答复。

String.Source: So they vanished. Or something vanished them. What then?
String.Dest: 就是说他们全部消失了，或者被什么东西给消灭了，然后呢？

String.Source: It was a knock. Like knuckles rapping against a door. And with each knock, the noise grew louder.
String.Dest: 这是敲击的声音。就像是用关节一下一下的敲着门。随着每一次敲击，声音也越来越大。

String.Source: So they vanished. Or something vanished them. What then?
String.Dest: 就是说他们全部消失了，或者被什么东西给消灭了，然后呢？

String.Source: No, not louder. Closer. I swiveled around, and in my panic I dropped my mace. It wasn't until I reached for it that I saw it.
String.Dest: 不，没有更大声。但更近了。我过转身去，害怕的丢掉了我的狼牙棒。直到我伸手够到了它，我才看到那是什么。

String.Source: What could possibly happen to you?
String.Dest: 你可能会怎么样？

String.Source: Oh, lots of things, although they usually happen at night, and when I'm alone. But I can't take the chance of them happening when others are around.
String.Dest: 噢，很多事情，虽然他们通常在夜晚发生，而且是在我独自一人的时候。当他人在四周之时我无法把握这些事情发生的机会。

String.Source: What could possibly happen to you?
String.Dest: 你可能会怎么样？

String.Source: I'd go out and help Reldith pick out cabbage heads, only they wouldn't be cabbage heads. They'd be the heads of little children.
String.Dest: 我想帮雷尔迪斯去挑菜梆子头，只是他们不要菜梆子头。他们要小孩子的头。

String.Source: What could possibly happen to you?
String.Dest: 你可能会怎么样？

String.Source: Then maybe Ragnar will ride by, still making the journey to Whiterun as a headless phantom.
String.Dest: 也许拉格纳骑马的时候会经过, 就像把到雪漫城的旅途当做毫无头绪的幻影一般。

String.Source: What could possibly happen to you?
String.Dest: 你可能会怎么样？

String.Source: Or maybe I'd visit Rorik's manor and that bear he has mounted on his wall will come alive and reach down and bite him, right while he's cooking.
String.Dest: Or maybe I'd visit Rorik's manor and that bear he has mounted on his wall will come alive and reach down and bite him, right while he's cooking.

String.Source: What could possibly happen to you?
String.Dest: 你可能会怎么样？

String.Source: Even here there are times I feel like my presence is a danger. Sometimes when I look up at the animals mounted above Mralki, I see the eyes move.
String.Dest: Even here there are times I feel like my presence is a danger. Sometimes when I look up at the animals mounted above Mralki, I see the eyes move.

String.Source: What could possibly happen to you?
String.Dest: 你可能会怎么样？

String.Source: As if someone were looking at me, from behind them.
String.Dest: 就好像有人在他们身后盯着我一样。

String.Source: You tried to help her.
String.Dest: 你已经尝试过帮她了。

String.Source: Indeed. I swore an oath to Ulfric Stormcloak, my brothers and sisters, but my oath to the Gods came before this menial task.
String.Dest: 当然。我已经对乌佛瑞克·暴风斗篷，对我的兄弟姐妹们立下了誓言，但我对诸神立下的誓言优先于这些小问题。

String.Source: How did you kill the wraith?
String.Dest: 你怎么干掉那个幽灵的？

String.Source: I didn't. I did what my mother always told me to do. I wanted to live. Then more than any other time, as two lives were on the line.
String.Dest: 我没有。我照着妈妈一直以来的教导去做了。我想活下去。这个念头从未像当时那样强烈，就仿佛两个人命悬一线。

String.Source: How did you kill the wraith?
String.Dest: 你怎么干掉那个幽灵的？

String.Source: And it worked. Until I became a Stormcloak. I think all that talk of dying and going to Sovngarde brought it all back.
String.Dest: 它起作用了。直到我成为了风暴斗篷。我想的是死后去到松加德把它全部带回。

String.Source: What's so special about Orphan Rock?
String.Dest: 孤儿岩有什么特别之处？

String.Source: There's a lot of tales parents tell their children to get them to eat their greens or pray to the Divines.
String.Dest: 父母总是给小孩讲很多故事典故来使孩子们吃绿色蔬菜或是向神祈祷.

String.Source: What's so special about Orphan Rock?
String.Dest: 孤儿岩有什么特别之处？

String.Source: One of them is the story of the Hagraven of Orphan Rock.
String.Dest: 其中之一就是有关孤儿岩的乌鸦鬼婆的故事。

String.Source: What's so special about Orphan Rock?
String.Dest: 孤儿岩有什么特别之处？

String.Source: They used to say if you didn't pray to the Nine, Arkay would send the old hag to kidnap you in your sleep.
String.Dest: 他们过去总说如果你不信仰九圣灵，阿尔凯会在你睡觉的时候派出老巫婆绑架你。

String.Source: What's so special about Orphan Rock?
String.Dest: 孤儿岩有什么特别之处？

String.Source: The witches of Orphan Rock are said to be the grown up versions of all the children who forgot their suppertime prayers.
String.Dest: 传说中，孤儿岩上的女巫会因为一个孩子忘了晚餐时间的祷告，而渐渐壮大。

String.Source: What's so special about Orphan Rock?
String.Dest: 孤儿岩有什么特别之处？

String.Source: As a young woman grown, I've long since outlived such juvenile tales, but my hand couldn't help but reach for my weapon.
String.Dest: 作为一个已经成长了的年轻女人，我已经过了听那些幼稚的故事的年纪了，但我的手还是不由自主地伸向了我的武器。

String.Source: You fancy Erik?
String.Dest: 你喜欢艾瑞克吗？

String.Source: He's nice enough. Got good hair, good teeth, and the inn will be his when Mralki's gone, so I wouldn't have to pay for a bed or a room.
String.Dest: 他挺不错的。英俊帅气，明眸皓齿，等穆拉基一走，这旅馆就是他的了，我得赶紧把租金交掉才是。

String.Source: You fancy the Slayer?
String.Dest: 你猜测那个杀手?

String.Source: Well, not because of what he does. I liked him better when he was just an innkeeper's son.
String.Dest: Well, not because of what he does. I liked him better when he was just an innkeeper's son.

String.Source: You fancy the Slayer?
String.Dest: 你猜测那个杀手?

String.Source: But if I was his wife, I suppose I could stay here forever, whether he was here or not.
String.Dest: 但如果我是他的妻子，我估计我会永远等在这里，哪怕他不在。

String.Source: Yikes! You are cursed.
String.Dest: 太糟了！你存心不良。

String.Source: Yes, and becoming a Daughter of Skyrim did not help. It's not just being unafraid of death.
String.Dest: 对, 成为天际省之女也没用. 不是说不怕死就行了.

String.Source: Yikes! You are cursed.
String.Dest: 太糟了！你存心不良。

String.Source: We Nords embrace it, for it is death that serves as the bridge to Sovngarde.
String.Dest: 我们诺德人信奉它，是因为死亡这种死亡是通往松加德的桥梁。

String.Source: Yikes! You are cursed.
String.Dest: 太糟了！你存心不良。

String.Source: It's the very same feeling that brought the wraith to my bed. My willingness to die. And it was my desire to live that warded it away.
String.Dest: 正是这十分相似的感受，我想死的愿望，将我死后的显形幻影带到了我的床前。但也是我的求生欲望将它赶走了。

String.Source: Were you at Helgen when the dragon attacked?
String.Dest: 那次海尔根被龙袭击的时候你也在场

String.Source: No, this was before. I'd just sworn the oath.
String.Dest: 不，那是以前的事了。我刚刚立下了誓言。

String.Source: Were you at Helgen when the dragon attacked?
String.Dest: 那次海尔根被龙袭击的时候你也在场

String.Source: But as one of the less talented sisters, I was tasked mostly with retrieving supplies from the city.
String.Dest: But as one of the less talented sisters, I was tasked mostly with retrieving supplies from the city.

String.Source: Were you at Helgen when the dragon attacked?
String.Dest: 那次海尔根被龙袭击的时候你也在场

String.Source: It happened on a Morndas. I was traveling on the road west to Helgen, when snow began to pelt my brow.
String.Dest: 那是一个星期一，我向西前往海尔根，那时，雪花抚上了我的额头。

String.Source: Were you at Helgen when the dragon attacked?
String.Dest: 那次海尔根被龙袭击的时候你也在场

String.Source: I no sooner blinked when the snowstorm came thundering from above.
String.Dest: I no sooner blinked when the snowstorm came thundering from above.

String.Source: Were you at Helgen when the dragon attacked?
String.Dest: 那次海尔根被龙袭击的时候你也在场

String.Source: Except there was a piece of black crouched further down the road. A woman wearing a hooded robe. Holding a small child.
String.Dest: 除了那里有一片黑色远远地横在路中间，以及一个穿着带风貌长袍、抱着小孩的女人。

String.Source: What brought this curse on?
String.Dest: 是什么招致了这个诅咒？

String.Source: It's always been a part of me. You see, my mother told me that I nearly died in childbirth.
String.Dest: 这从来都是我生活的一部分。你知道，我妈告诉我，我几乎在还是小孩的时候就夭折掉了。

String.Source: What brought this curse on?
String.Dest: 是什么招致了这个诅咒？

String.Source: As a result, part of my soul was close to the void, and the wandering dead were drawn to me in their confusion.
String.Dest: 结果就是，我的部分灵魂接近于无，所以那些行尸被我蒙混过去了。

String.Source: What brought this curse on?
String.Dest: 是什么招致了这个诅咒？

String.Source: Yet she told me not to worry. As long as my heart was full of life, it would fill that empty part of my soul, and ward off the dead.
String.Dest: 然后她还是让我别担心。只要我的心还没死，我的生命就会充满生机，驱逐死亡的阴影。

String.Source: What brought this curse on?
String.Dest: 是什么招致了这个诅咒？

String.Source: Her advice was unnecessary, as a child's spirit is as stout as Shor's Bones.
String.Dest: 作为一个孩子，她的建议的多余的。一个孩子的心灵如同舒尔之骨一般结实。

String.Source: What brought this curse on?
String.Dest: 是什么招致了这个诅咒？

String.Source: It wasn't until I was a girl of 12, my heart broken by a boy I loved, that I first yearned for death.
String.Dest: 直到我成长为一个12岁的女孩儿，我的心被一个我深爱的男孩儿打碎了。那是我第一次渴望死亡。

String.Source: What brought this curse on?
String.Dest: 是什么招致了这个诅咒？

String.Source: After your heart was broken, the curse came for you?
String.Dest: 你心碎之后，诅咒就袭来了？

String.Source: Indeed. That night, as I lay in my bed, the air was so cold, even in the middle of Sun's Height.
String.Dest: 确实。那天晚上，我躺在床上，冷得要命，即使那时候是在日高月中旬。

String.Source: What brought this curse on?
String.Dest: 是什么招致了这个诅咒？

String.Source: After your heart was broken, the curse came for you?
String.Dest: 你心碎之后，诅咒就袭来了？

String.Source: I huddled under the covers, trying to stave off the cold. I had reached a point where I felt I could sleep, when I heard it. The breathing.
String.Dest: 我在被单下缩成一团试着暖和一点。当我听到它时，我觉得我已经快要睡着了。那是风的声音。

String.Source: Hold that thought. Let's continue this conversation later.
String.Dest: 停止那个念头。我们之后再继续这个谈话。

String.Source: All right, then.
String.Dest: 那就这样吧。

String.Source: A newborn babe is alone in the forest is a scary proposition.
String.Dest: 一个新生的婴儿独自在森林里是一件可怕的事。

String.Source: As I said, no place for a child. So I hurried after her. Best I could tell, she was headed toward Orphan Rock.
String.Dest: 正如我所说，那不是小孩子待的地方。因此我紧跟她后面，我有种预感，她应该是想要前往孤儿岩的.

String.Source: A newborn babe is alone in the forest is a scary proposition.
String.Dest: 一个新生的婴儿独自在森林里是一件可怕的事。

String.Source: The one place every Nord child in Helgen fears.
String.Dest: 是个每个在海尔根的诺德孩子都害怕的地方。

String.Source: I know those forests. The cold is so raw it frisks your bones.
String.Dest: 我知道那些树林。那里冷得要命，让你的骨头颤抖。

String.Source: As I said, no place for a child. So I hurried after her. Best I could tell, she was headed toward Orphan Rock.
String.Dest: 正如我所说，那不是小孩子待的地方。因此我紧跟她后面，我有种预感，她应该是想要前往孤儿岩的.

String.Source: I know those forests. The cold is so raw it frisks your bones.
String.Dest: 我知道那些树林。那里冷得要命，让你的骨头颤抖。

String.Source: The one place every Nord child in Helgen fears.
String.Dest: 是个每个在海尔根的诺德孩子都害怕的地方。

String.Source: The woman you found on the road...did you try to speak to her?
String.Dest: 关于那个你在路上碰到的女人......你有试着和她谈谈吗？

String.Source: I called out to her. I was relieved when she stood up, but the relief was short lived.
String.Dest: 我大声喊她。在她停下时感到了一点放松，可惜也只放松了一下下。

String.Source: The woman you found on the road...did you try to speak to her?
String.Dest: 关于那个你在路上碰到的女人......你有试着和她谈谈吗？

String.Source: She scurried off into the forest. It was no place for a child.
String.Dest: 她急匆匆地进入森林。那样的地方不适合一个孩子。

String.Source: The woman you found on the road...did you try to speak to her?
String.Dest: 关于那个你在路上碰到的女人......你有试着和她谈谈吗？

String.Source: The sun was dimming, and in the winter, the night is as fast as it is long.
String.Dest: 太阳渐暗，在冬日，夜幕来的快而且长。

String.Source: The woman you found on the road...did you try to speak to her?
String.Dest: 关于那个你在路上碰到的女人......你有试着和她谈谈吗？

String.Source: The air was cold, but not the kind of cold that pimples your skin.
String.Dest: 空气很冷，但不是那种刺骨的寒冷.

String.Source: The woman you found on the road...did you try to speak to her?
String.Dest: 关于那个你在路上碰到的女人......你有试着和她谈谈吗？

String.Source: No, this was cold raw enough that you could feel it pass through your teeth, even when your mouth was closed.
String.Dest: 不，这寒冷够你感觉到它穿过你的牙缝——就算你的嘴一直是闭上的。

String.Source: By the Divines, what did you do?
String.Dest: 圣灵在上？你干了啥啊？

String.Source: I did what any sane Nord would've done. I ran.
String.Dest: 我做了任何神志清醒的诺德人都会做的事。我跑了。

String.Source: By the Divines, what did you do?
String.Dest: 圣灵在上？你干了啥啊？

String.Source: When I got back to the camp, the Quartermaster demanded to know where I'd been, and what happened to the supplies.
String.Dest: When I got back to the camp, the Quartermaster demanded to know where I'd been, and what happened to the supplies.

String.Source: By the Divines, what did you do?
String.Dest: 圣灵在上？你干了啥啊？

String.Source: In truth, no explanation would suffice. It's just as well, because even I can't explain what was under my feet that night.
String.Dest: 实际上，不必解释了。这样就好，因为即使是我也无法说明那晚我脚跟底下是什么。

String.Source: Ooh. I bet the woman was buried there. Child too.
String.Dest: 噢. 我打赌那个女人被埋在那. 孩子也是.

String.Source: That's what I told my brothers and sisters back at the camp. They thought it was an excuse for not retrieving the supplies.
String.Dest: 那正是回到营地时我告诉兄弟姊妹的话。不过他们认为那只不过是我没取回补给品的借口

String.Source: Ooh. I bet the woman was buried there. Child too.
String.Dest: 噢. 我打赌那个女人被埋在那. 孩子也是.

String.Source: It didn't help that I was known for telling stories by the campfire.
String.Dest: 我是很擅长在篝火旁讲故事，但这有什么用。

String.Source: Ooh. I bet the woman was buried there. Child too.
String.Dest: 噢. 我打赌那个女人被埋在那. 孩子也是.

String.Source: To them this was just another tale I had cooked up like a chef makes beef stew.
String.Dest: 对他们来说，我像个厨师一样做出道炖牛肉就是另一个故事了。

String.Source: Unfortunate, but duty calls. You ignore the peasants and retrieve the supplies.
String.Dest: 很不幸，但这是职责所在。你无视了那些农民并取回了物资。

String.Source: You must have us confused with Imperials, friend. Retrieving the supplies was my duty as a soldier, but the mother and child were my duty as a Nord.
String.Dest: You must have us confused with Imperials, friend. Retrieving the supplies was my duty as a soldier, but the mother and child were my duty as a Nord.

String.Source: You'll have to leave this inn eventually.
String.Dest: 你终究得离开这家客栈。

String.Source: No, I'll starve to death first. I am a daughter of Skyrim. I don't fear death. I fear "fear." And spiders, but everyone's afraid of crawlies.
String.Dest: 不，首先我会死于饥饿。我是天际的女儿。我不畏惧死亡。我畏惧“恐惧”。以及蜘蛛，因为人人都会畏惧它的獠牙。

String.Source: Whatever it was, it was scary. And I think I need a change of clothes.
String.Dest: 不管它是什么，很恐怖就是了。而且我想我需要换件行头。

String.Source: Me too. It's such a haunting story, I think I soil myself every time I tell it.
String.Dest: 我也是。这故事实在诡异，我觉得每次讲出来都是在败坏自己。

String.Source: You seem spooked rather easily.
String.Dest: 你看起来很容易受到惊吓。

String.Source: So my brethren used to tell me. But I feel it's warranted. I don't care if Ulfric himself bent his knee and asked me to join the cause.
String.Dest: 所以我弟兄们曾经告诉我。但我觉得这是值得的。如果乌佛瑞克自己向我屈膝，要我加入风暴斗篷，我才不关心他这么做的原因呢。

String.Source: You seem spooked rather easily.
String.Dest: 你看起来很容易受到惊吓。

String.Source: I'm staying inside where it's safe and warm.
String.Dest: 我会呆在里面。那里又温暖又安全。

String.Source: Oh, those boys. So cruel. Just like men.
String.Dest: 哦，那些男孩。如此残忍。就像男人。

String.Source: Yes, I thought he loved me, but I was nothing but a toy for his amusement.
String.Dest: 是的, 我想他爱我, 但我只是他消遣的一个玩物而已.

String.Source: Oh, those boys. So cruel. Just like men.
String.Dest: 哦，那些男孩。如此残忍。就像男人。

String.Source: It cut deeper than any sword, and hurt more than any loss I could ever experience as a woman grown.
String.Dest: 作为一个女人长大，我从未经历过比这伤我更深，比这更令我痛心的事情。

String.Source: Oh, those boys. So cruel. Just like men.
String.Dest: 哦，那些男孩。如此残忍。就像男人。

String.Source: Funny as it is to say, there is nothing more emotionally wrenching than a young girl experiencing her first heartbreak.
String.Dest: 真是有趣，人们都说再也没有比少女怀春更悸动的情感了。

String.Source: Oh, those boys. So cruel. Just like men.
String.Dest: 哦，那些男孩。如此残忍。就像男人。

String.Source: I wanted to die more than anything, and Arkay saw fit to grant my wish.
String.Dest: 我认为死亡比什么都重要，而阿尔凯会适当的满足我的心愿

String.Source: And that brought on the curse.
String.Dest: 那触发了诅咒。

String.Source: It did. It's silly to say, because as adults we experience things 1000 times more hurtful than a simple heartbreak.
String.Dest: 是的. 这很难形容, 因为我们成年人经历的沧桑要比蛋碎伤1000倍.

String.Source: And that brought on the curse.
String.Dest: 那触发了诅咒。

String.Source: But never in my years did I feel a stronger sense of grief, or a deeper wound, than when he said the words "No."
String.Dest: 在我有生之年，我从未如此的敏感被悲伤所害，当他说出‘不’的时候，我从未被伤得如此之深。

String.Source: And that brought on the curse.
String.Dest: 那触发了诅咒。

String.Source: I wanted to die more than anything, and Arkay saw fit to grant my wish.
String.Dest: 我认为死亡比什么都重要，而阿尔凯会适当的满足我的心愿

String.Source: I see. It still sounds fairly mundane. What happened at Orphan Rock?
String.Dest: 哦我明白了，不过这听起来也没什么特别的。在孤儿岩那里又发生了什么事？

String.Source: Darkness set in. I bit my lip, trying to keep my focus on the woman and the child.
String.Dest: 黑暗开始涌入。我咬了咬嘴唇，试着将注意力集中在那女人和孩子上。

String.Source: I see. It still sounds fairly mundane. What happened at Orphan Rock?
String.Dest: 哦我明白了，不过这听起来也没什么特别的。在孤儿岩那里又发生了什么事？

String.Source: I followed their tracks through the narrow passageway formed by the Rock, but when I came out on the other side, the trail had vanished.
String.Dest: 我跟随他们的踪迹穿过石头堆砌的窄道，但当我从另一边出来时，踪迹却已经消失了。

String.Source: So you were scared of Orphan Rock, but you had to chase them. Then what?
String.Dest: 所以你害怕孤儿岩，但你得去追他们。不然还能怎样？

String.Source: Darkness set in. I bit my lip, trying to keep my focus on the woman and the child.
String.Dest: 黑暗开始涌入。我咬了咬嘴唇，试着将注意力集中在那女人和孩子上。

String.Source: So you were scared of Orphan Rock, but you had to chase them. Then what?
String.Dest: 所以你害怕孤儿岩，但你得去追他们。不然还能怎样？

String.Source: I followed their tracks through the narrow passageway formed by the Rock, but when I came out on the other side, the trail had vanished.
String.Dest: 我跟随他们的踪迹穿过石头堆砌的窄道，但当我从另一边出来时，踪迹却已经消失了。

String.Source: Orphan Rock. A dangerous place. Not exactly child's play.
String.Dest: 孤儿岩。很危险的地方。根本不是孩子玩耍的场所。.

String.Source: Aye, a Hagraven's nest, but it isn't Hagravens that made this story.
String.Dest: 是啊，一个乌鸦鬼婆的老窝，但编了这个故事的可不是乌鸦鬼婆。

String.Source: Orphan Rock. A dangerous place. Not exactly child's play.
String.Dest: 孤儿岩。很危险的地方。根本不是孩子玩耍的场所。.

String.Source: It was Nord men and women, telling tales to get their children to pray to the Nine.
String.Dest: 正是诺德的男男女女，向孩子们讲述九圣灵的传说，让孩子们向九圣灵祷告。

String.Source: Orphan Rock. A dangerous place. Not exactly child's play.
String.Dest: 孤儿岩。很危险的地方。根本不是孩子玩耍的场所。.

String.Source: The story went that if you forgot to pray, Arkay would send a Hagraven to snatch you from your bed.
String.Dest: 传说，如果你忘了祷告，阿尔凯会派出一只乌鸦鬼婆把你从床上抓走。

String.Source: Orphan Rock. A dangerous place. Not exactly child's play.
String.Dest: 孤儿岩。很危险的地方。根本不是孩子玩耍的场所。.

String.Source: Children were told that all the witches that haunt Orphan Rock were once boys and girls like them.
String.Dest: 孩子们听说那些孤儿岩的女巫原本都是他们那样的小孩。

String.Source: Orphan Rock. A dangerous place. Not exactly child's play.
String.Dest: 孤儿岩。很危险的地方。根本不是孩子玩耍的场所。.

String.Source: As a young woman grown, I've long since outlived such juvenile tales, but my hand couldn't help but reach for my weapon.
String.Dest: 作为一个已经成长了的年轻女人，我已经过了听那些幼稚的故事的年纪了，但我的手还是不由自主地伸向了我的武器。

String.Source: An empty stance. You know Mralki would never let you starve.
String.Dest: 一个空位。你知道穆拉基永远不会让你挨饿。

String.Source: Maybe. But it's not as if I don't work for what he gives me. I'm the unofficial tavern wench around here.
String.Dest: 可能吧，但这并不意味着我不会去完成你交给我的工作。我是这儿附近的非正式酒馆丫头。

String.Source: An empty stance. You know Mralki would never let you starve.
String.Dest: 一个空位。你知道穆拉基永远不会让你挨饿。

String.Source: Sweeping, washing, and giving this place the occasional woman's touch.
String.Dest: 打扫啊，清洁啊，让这个地方充满家庭主妇的气息吧。

String.Source: An empty stance. You know Mralki would never let you starve.
String.Dest: 一个空位。你知道穆拉基永远不会让你挨饿。

String.Source: And if a customer gets fresh, I can wield my mace better than any broom.
String.Dest: 要是有哪个顾客【顶嘴】，我能把锤子耍得比任何笤帚都好。

String.Source: By the Divines, I think there's a spider on your neck!
String.Dest: 圣灵在上，我觉得有只蜘蛛在你脖子上！

String.Source: Agh! AAGH! Get it off me! Wait, I don't feel anything...that's a mean trick.
String.Dest: 啊，啊！滚开！等等。。什么都没有。。这是个障眼法。

String.Source: Aah! Oh, you frightened me traveler. You shouldn't just greet someone unexpectedly.
String.Dest: 啊！噢，你吓了我一跳，旅行者。别突然跳过来打招呼啊。

String.Source: Goodbye.
String.Dest: 再见。

String.Source: Until next time.
String.Dest: 下回见。

String.Source: All right, then.
String.Dest: 那就这样吧。

String.Source: About time.
String.Dest: 是时候了。

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 哈啰。

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: Well met.
String.Dest: 幸会。

String.Source: Well met.
String.Dest: 幸会。

String.Source: Greetings.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: Make it quick.
String.Dest: 快点好吗？

String.Source: Something on your mind?
String.Dest: 你有什么心事吗？

String.Source: Something on your mind?
String.Dest: 有什么想法？

String.Source: How can I help you?
String.Dest: 有什么我能效劳的？

String.Source: Hm?
String.Dest: 嗯？
